materials.raw_text: Hg (Mercury) - 100 g, Sc (Scandium) - 50 g, Si (Silicon) - 40 g, Tm (Thulium) - 80 g

sourcing.instructions: Hg: Obtain from a chemical supplier or specialized metal vendor; Sc: Purchase from a rare earth metal supplier; Si: Available from electronics suppliers; Tm: Source from a rare earth element supplier.
steps: Hg: Obtain from a chemical supplier or specialized metal vendor; Sc: Purchase from a rare earth metal supplier; Si: Available from electronics suppliers; Tm: Source from a rare earth element supplier.

1. Weigh out 100 g of Hg using a digital scale. 2. Weigh 50 g of Sc, ensuring high purity. 3. Weigh 40 g of Si, using a clean container. 4. Weigh 80 g of Tm, taking care to handle with gloves. 5. In a fume hood, combine Hg, Sc, Si, and Tm in a glass container. 6. Stir the mixture thoroughly using a stainless steel stirrer for 10 minutes to ensure homogeneity.
